name: TalkLandros
_source: speak;Sages;I'm good! What are you reading?
speak;Landros;A primer on meteorology, storms are so fascinating...
speak;Sages;Really? They just make you all wet and blustered!
speak;Landros;Well, sure, but it's also fascinating how it occurs.
speak;Sages;Isn't it the will of the Goddess?
speak;Landros;Hmph, that fable?|I don't care if it's blasphemy, but I care about the truth.
speak;Landros;I can give you the long, or the short explanation.
speak;Landros;Alright.|The air around us has differing press-
speak;Sages;On second thoughts, maybe I'll pass.
